languages.text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.
languages.original_text: Персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}потерял сознание{/g} в бою и теперь страдает от {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старого ранения{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или попытаться использовать медкомплект.

traits.locale_text: The character fell unconscious in a fight and is now suffering an old injury. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

languages.text: Персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}потерял сознание{/g} в бою и теперь страдает от {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старого ранения{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или попытаться использовать медкомплект.
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

languages.text: Der Charakter ist in einem Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} geworden und leidet nun unter einer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}alten Verletzung{/g}. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter ist in einem Kampf bewusstlos geworden und leidet nun unter einer alten Verletzung. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.

languages.text: Le personnage a {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdu connaissance{/g} lors d'un combat et souffre maintenant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion ancienne{/g}. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou essayez d'utiliser un médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage a perdu connaissance lors d'un combat et souffre maintenant d'une lésion ancienne. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou essayez d'utiliser le médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.

languages.text: 此角色之前在战斗中陷入了{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态，目前正在承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}旧伤{/g}的折磨。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或尝试使用医疗包移除伤口。
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: 此角色在战斗中陷入了昏迷状态，目前正在承受旧伤的折磨。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或尝试使用医疗包移除伤口。

languages.text: El personaje ha quedado {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} y ahora sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión vieja{/g}. Visita la nave del vacío o intenta usar un botiquín para tratar la lesión.
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: El personaje ha quedado inconsciente y ahora sufre una lesión antigua. Visita la nave del vacío o intenta usar un botiquín para tratar la lesión.

languages.text: そのキャラクターは戦いで{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識を失い{/g}、今は{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}古傷{/g}に苦しめられている。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるか、メディキットで負傷を取り除いてみよう。
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: そのキャラクターは戦いで{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識を失い{/g}、今は{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}古傷{/g}に苦しめられている。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるか、メディキットで負傷を取り除いてみよう。

languages.text: Karakter, çatışma esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşerek bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}eski sakatlığa{/g} maruz kaldı. Sakatlıktan kurtulmak için uçsuz gemine uğra veya sıhhiye çantası kullanmayı dene.
languages.original_text: The character fell {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in a fight and is now suffering an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injury{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.
